abilities.description: User pumps their blood at high speed to enhance physical abilities, dramatically increasing speed and power while producing steam.
A Gear 2-enhanced version of the whip attack, executed at high speed.

reveals.information: The Gomu Gomu no Mi can be used to create Gear 2 by pumping blood at accelerated rates

abilities.description: Multiple spinning air blade projectiles created by combining Rokushiki with the giraffe form's leg strength.

name.japanese: ネコネコの実 モデル:豹

abilities.description: Combines leopard features with human form for maximum combat effectiveness, enhancing speed, strength, and ferocity while maintaining human intelligence and Rokushiki mastery.
A rapid-fire barrage of Shigan finger pistol strikes enhanced by the hybrid form's speed and power.

reveals.information: Rob Lucci's leopard-human hybrid form combines Zoan transformation with Rokushiki for devastating combat abilities
